issue.title: [FCD] Specify whether monotonic_clock is a distinct type or a typedef

discussion.p: What it means for monotonic_clock to be a synonym is undefined. If it may or may not be a typedef, then certain classes of programs become unportable.
Require that it be a distinct class type.
discussion.blockquote: Paper n3128 addresses this issue by replacing monotonic_clock with steady_clock, which is not a typedef.
